author: m.kalinin
content: the confirmation rule does not require coordination. so it is not necessary to assign its delivery to a HF, tho the sooner we have it the better

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Has there been any more movement on designing this `wallet_*` namespace?  Semi-related: has there been any discussions around "better" nonce management features beyond `eth_getTransactionCount`?

author: sky.cactus
content: Not that I know of on either count.
